thread.title: Report: Teams to inquire about Payton in offseason

title: Report: Teams to inquire about Payton in offseason
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Report: Teams to inquire about Payton in offseason ESPN's Adam Schefter is reporting that "multiple" teams are expected to ask about Saints head coach Sean Payton this offseason. Post to Facebook Report: Teams to inquire about Payton in offseason ESPN's Adam Schefter is reporting that "multiple" teams are expected to ask about Saints head coach Sean Payton this offseason.  //on.wwltv.com/1LppG1K   Report: Teams to inquire about Payton in offseason 11:11 a.m. CDT October 11, 2015 Sep 20, 2015; New Orleans, LA, USA; New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton in the second half of their game against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. The Tampa Bay Buccaneers won, 23-19. Mandatory Credit: Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Chuck Cook, Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
NEW ORLEANS -- ESPN's Adam Schefter is reporting that "multiple" teams are expected to ask about Saints head coach Sean Payton this offseason. 
Schefter mentions the Miami Dolphins and Indianapolis Colts as teams that could inquire about Payton's availability. The Dolphins recently replaced Joe Philbin with interim head coach Dan Campbell, and Chuck Pagano and the Colts struggled out the gate en route to a 3-2 start. 
Payton is under contract until 2017, so a trade or a firing would have to happen for him to switch teams. 
Similar reports have surfaced around Payton over the last several years, but the Super Bowl-winning head coach has returned each time to New Orleans. Read or Share this story: http://on.wwltv.com/1LppG1K TOP VIDEOS
